Description:
Responsible for development of new highly-responsive, web-based user interface.
Work and collaborate with the rest of the engineering team.
Learn and understand user interactions.
Develop a flexible and well-structured front-end architecture, along with the APIs to support it.
You will be involved from conception to completion with projects that are technologically sound and aesthetically impressive.
Your primary focus will be on developing user interface components and implementing them following well-known React.js workflows (such as Flux or Redux).
You will ensure that these components and the overall application are robust and easy to maintain.Job Details
